```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(car)
library(emmeans)
library(tableone)
```

```{r }
dat <- readxl::read_xlsx("H:/Neonatology/Powell/Analysis discrepancy/9MonthOldSkeletalMuscleLipidsForClaire_6.1.22.xlsx",
                         sheet=1)
dat$mod_group <- paste(dat$Group,dat$`Treatment (PBS/ADN)`)
dat$test <- dat$`1,2-di16:0DG`
dat$test2 <- dat$`1,2-16:0/18:0DG`

# one without a significant interaction
mod1 <- lm(dat$`1,2-di14:0DG` ~ dat$mod_group*dat$`Sex (M/F)`)
Anova(mod1)

mod1a <- lm(dat$test ~ dat$mod_group*dat$`Sex (M/F)`)
Anova(mod1a)

mod1b <- lm(dat$test ~ dat$mod_group)
Anova(mod1b)
emmeans(mod1b, ~mod_group)

# one with a significant interaction
hist(dat$`1,2-14:0/16:1DG`)
dat$`l_1,2-14:0/16:1DG` <- log(dat$`1,2-14:0/16:1DG`)
hist(dat$`l_1,2-14:0/16:1DG`)

mod2 <- lm(dat$`l_1,2-14:0/16:1DG` ~ dat$mod_group*dat$`Sex (M/F)`)
Anova(mod2)

# another without significant interaction
mod3 <- lm(dat$test2 ~ dat$mod_group*dat$`Sex (M/F)`)
Anova(mod3)

mod3a <- lm(dat$test2 ~ dat$mod_group)
Anova(mod3a)
emmeans(mod3a, ~mod_group)


```
